attributes.title: Ruined my day
attributes.review: After installing this app my house became haunted and my pet hamster ran away! I am also really upset how it took A WEEK to download. I had very high hopes for the 🍊oranges🍊app but the app was TERRIBLE AS WELL

attributes.title: very glitchy!
attributes.review: i downloaded this app to get the latest news on our president, but all i was met with were unbearable glitches. the app can barely start up, and when i finally got around to putting in my number, it just crashes and the cycle repeats. i’m very disappointed. this app is actually terrible. 1 star.

attributes.title: Bad App
attributes.review: I don’t like this app. There’s a big orange man on the opening screen and it gave me nightmares🥺🥺. I would’ve left a different rating✨🤩🧚‍♂️but it won’t let me put 0 stars💕💕✨🥰

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app kept on crashing and it kept telling me to vote for a useless piece of crap. also, once you open it, it displays the pic of a Cheeto man 🤮 this app is truly a monstrosity

attributes.title: trash!
attributes.review: i downloaded this app for a day and my phone LITERALLY CRASHED. If i could rate this a 0 i would. i had to restart my phone completely wth. no one needs this app.

attributes.title: HEEHHE
attributes.review: the app kept crashing was very slow didn’t know where to do anything a VERY bad app in my opinion the whole set up was just terrible

i do nawt recommend this app everyone is saying really atrocious stuff like “this is such a good app” “trump 2020” while it has traumatized me and had me in therapy ever since. i keep getting creepy messages from the app asking to go to one lf trumps rallys. my dog started saying trump 2020. i went outside and um oranges and shrimps. they chanted trump 2020. i do not recommend this app unless you want to be ✨brainwashed✨.

attributes.title: GEN Z RISE UP
attributes.review: disgusting absolutely horrible app. tiktok is and will always be superior. we will fight you and we won’t back down. this app is trash. the app gave my phone a virus because of how dumb it is✨🧚🏼✨🧚🏼✨🧚🏼✨🧚🏼🤠🤠🤠🤠🤠🤠

attributes.title: Caused therapy
attributes.review: This app is so scary all of a sudden I saw trumps nudes pop op on my screen this made me suffer from anxiety and now I have to go to a therapist ✌️ that’s charges 500 a session this is no ok I will be leaving a law suit

attributes.title: Too bad 🤧🤧🤧
attributes.review: I got this app because I was really excited to reaffirm my facist beliefs, but I was super bummed because it kept crashing 😖😖😖, now I have to visit Cheeto Man’s twitter to get my racism, homophobia, xenophobia, and sexism fix. 😤 #orangelivesmatter
